pr_title: (#1300) Replace collection's Reversed by Iterator's Reversed

timeline.bodyText: @victornoel I didn't understood this test, seems that nothing is being done... Also, could you try to put it in just one assertion?
timeline.author: paulodamaso

replies.bodyText: @paulodamaso I wanted to verify that that the iterable could be iterated multiple times, I will transform it so that it's clearer and also with only one assertion
replies.author: victornoel

replies.bodyText: @victornoel Well, I think that it was better the other way, could you please change it back?
replies.author: paulodamaso
